name: Gorf the Frog
description:
Gorf will marry Gorfa but your arch enemy Tony attacks during the ceremony, and now this little frog need to cross the enormous island to rescue your loved one.

The principal mechanic of a game where the protagonist is a frog, surely would be the jumping, but wait, careful to not fall, control your strenth well or the sewers will be waiting for you.

Controls and mechanics

Hold space and directional keys and release to jump right and left
